sourcesContent:
import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import Message from '../components/Message' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import {listProductDetails} from '../actions/productActions' function ProductScreen() { const {id} = useParams() const dispatch = useDispatch() const productDetails = useSelector(state => state.productDetails) const {loading, error, product} = productDetails useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(listProductDetails(id)) }, []) return (
Strona główna {loading ? : error ? :

{product.name}

 Cena: {product.price} zł Opis: {product.description} Cena: {product. price} zł Status: {product.countInStock >= 1 ? dostępny : niedostępny} }
) } export default ProductScreen
